component.name: NickMediaPlayer
component.script:
sub init() audio = m.top.findNode("nickAudio") audio.ObserveField("allDone", "handleMediaDone") video = m.top.findNode("nickVideo") video.ObserveField("allDone", "handleMediaDone") end sub
function play() as void player = invalid if (m.top.mediaType = "Video") then player = m.top.findNode("nickVideo") else if (m.top.mediaType = "Audio") then player = m.top.findNode("nickAudio") else print "Unsupported media!: " + m.top.mediaType return end if
player.name = m.top.name player.uri = m.top.uri player.url = m.top.url player.callFunc("play") end function
sub handleMediaDone() m.markPlayedTask = CreateObject("roSGNode", "markPlayedTask") m.markPlayedTask.uri = m.top.uri m.markPlayedTask.ObserveField("allDone", "fireAllDone") m.markPlayedTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub fireAllDone() print "NickMediaPlayer is All Done" m.top.allDone = True end sub
